channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [TIKA-2871] TestChmExtraction - testMultiThreaded throws exception 1.21-rc1
item.description:
During mvn clean install I've seen an exception"

<code>

[INFO] Running org.apache.tika.parser.chm.TestChmExtraction
org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException: can't copy beyond array length
        at org.apache.tika.parser.chm.core.ChmCommons.copyOfRange(ChmCommons.java:347)

        at org.apache.tika.MultiThreadedTikaTest.testMultiThreaded(MultiThreadedTikaTest.java:77)
        at org.apache.tika.parser.chm.TestChmExtraction.testMultiThreaded(TestChmExtraction.java:225)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
        at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:62)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
        at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:498)

        at org.junit.runners.BlockJUnit4ClassRunner.runChild(BlockJUnit4ClassRunner.java:63)
        at org.junit.runners.ParentRunner$4.run(ParentRunner.java:330)
        at org.junit.runners.ParentRunner$1.schedule(ParentRunner.java:78)
        at org.junit.runners.ParentRunner.runChildren(ParentRunner.java:328)
        at org.junit.runners.ParentRunner.access$100(ParentRunner.java:65)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: The exception is being thrown, caught and stacktrace-printed on "testChm_oom.chm". I just pushed an update to skip that file. I don't think this is a problem with the parser or the test, necessarily.
oom file skipped in multithreaded tests. Thank you, oleg@apache.org!

FAILURE: Integrated in Jenkins build tika-2.x-windows #417 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/tika-2.x-windows/417/)
TIKA-2871 – don't include testChm_oom.chm in multithreaded tests. (tallison: rev 7ec0dc07f360b431569e87f237b3cae3619d1568)

  • (edit) tika-parsers/src/test/java/org/apache/tika/parser/chm/TestChmExtraction.java
